title: ellelli Adi
sahitya:
ellelli Adi bande hELayya ranga nillo nillo tALo tALo gOvinda


caraNam 1    mukhadalli krpevariTTIde hosa hosa pari suddi huTTide nasunaguvella ninna kIrti heccide
    caraNam 2    kaiyalli ungura elli hOgide ninna badukella avaLige sAgide alla avaLa mahime hIgide
    caraNam 3    ninna kaLavu nAnu eSTendu hELali kaDEyinda kaDege tALide 
kaDegella haruSa tOride purandara viTTala ninage nanake hIgAgide
